name: Invertigolf
description:
Play gravity inverting golf in this game inspired by the Nokia 3310. Each stroke, gravity inverts. Avoid traps and use gravity and other obstacles to your advantage or detriment.

Controls

Aim - WASD or Arrow Keys

Shoot - Hold space to charge your shot and release when it's at the right level.

Restart a level - R

Look around the level - L to toggle. WASD or arrow keys to move the camera.
